Articles.Content: Has this feature now been removed or is it just me?  In map view it was always possible to double-click on a craft to focus view on that particular craft.  This feature doesn't appear to be working for me now (v 1.1.1) though it still works on planets and moons.  I was just wondering if anyone else is suffering from this and whether it's been fixed in 1.1.2
I'm not sure about the double clicking thing, but if you accidentally lose focus on the ship you are flying you can press backspace to re focus on it.
